Snake #1 is still some distance off, so right now there's no immediate threat of collision. However, it's essential to continually reassess the situation to avoid being cornered or running into an enemy. 

Regarding my next moves after eating the apple at (0,8), I need to start going right to head toward the apples near (4,4), (4,5), and (4,6). Hopefully, I can get there before Snake #1 does.

Next move: UP.
